body: X11 supports it just fine, but GLFW doesn't.
Icon support will be added at some point. In the meantime, it is possible to achieve via _NET_WM_ICON and the native API.
Since there isn't an issue for window icon support yet, I'll hijack this one.

issue.title: Add glfwSetWindowIcons

repository.name: glfw
repository.description: A multi-platform library for OpenGL, OpenGL ES, Vulkan, window and input

issue.body:
There is currently only an implementation for the X11 backend, all of the other ones are stubbed, as I won’t be able to test a Mir, Win32 or Cocoa implementation.  The Wayland protocol currently doesn’t support that feature, so I added a comment describing that.

How do you usually deal with such PRs, do you merge them and then wait for other PRs to implement the same feature on other backends, or do you stall the PR until people have provided the missing implementations?

issue.title: Taskbar Icon Support

repository.name: lwjgl3
repository.description: LWJGL is a Java library that enables cross-platform access to popular native APIs useful in the development of graphics (OpenGL, Vulkan, bgfx), audio (OpenAL, Opus), parallel computing (OpenCL, CUDA) and XR (OpenVR, LibOVR, OpenXR) applications.

issue.body: As far as I have seen, there is no feature in LWJGL 3 for setting taskbar icons in Windows for an application (previously accomplished through Display.setIcons(ByteBuffer[])).

issue.title: windowicon merge ETA

milestone.title: None
milestone.description: This is for issues that do not belong to any milestone, to tell them apart from un-reviewed issues closed by the submitter.

repository.name: glfw
repository.description: A multi-platform library for OpenGL, OpenGL ES, Vulkan, window and input

issue.body: For a while I have been using GLFW with Java through LWJGL. Unfortunately, as I am developing with Java and not compiling executables, it is not possible for me to include a GLFW_ICON resource. I saw that there is a [branch that adds window icon compatibility with GLFWimages](https://github.com/glfw/glfw/compare/windowicon). Any idea so as to when this will become available in the master branch?
